title: Celebrating The Work Of Robin Williams
teaser: We listen back to some of the comedy star's great roles, including "Mork & Mindy," "Mrs. Doubtfire" and "The Birdcage."
contentencoded:
Comedy star Robin Williams died yesterday at age 63. Sheriff’s officials say he committed suicide by hanging himself in his San Francisco Bay Area home.

Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson listens back to some of Williams’ great roles in films including “Dead Poets Society,” “Mrs. Doubtfire,” “The Birdcage,” “Aladdin” and “Good Morning, Vietnam,” as well as the TV series “Mork & Mindy.”
